email.title: StarLeaf Industrial Placement
email.sponsor:
### Cloud R&D Watford, England, United Kingdom
#### Description
We are interested in speaking with students from Imperial College London that are looking for a place to complete their industrial placements in 2021. We can consider students looking for either four or 6-month placements.
#### What you can expect
As an Intern in one of our software engineering groups, you will be assigned an experienced software engineer as your mentor and be given a desk within the group. We will identify a project suited to your level of experience that will deliver a feature or a tool that is directly applicable to our business. Your experience as an intern will be as close as possible as a full-time member of our team. We are confident that this experience will give you a valuable understanding of how a software engineering team functions in a commercial environment.
Our software teams design and implement complex systems across a wide range of technologies and programming languages, including C, C#, C++, Java, Python, SQL, and Javascript. We make extensive use of continuous integration and deployment methodologies based on tools such as Salt, Jenkins, pytest, Catch, and homegrown automated system test frameworks. We place emphasis on high quality, well-tested code and a quick turnaround time for adding new features to our products. We believe that this is an ideal environment for you to take your first steps in commercial software engineering
### You can find more details and apply by following [**this link**](https://apply.workable.com/starleaf/j/12FA12111C/)
